questions.name: product_type
questions.text: How would you describe the type of product are you planning to make? For example, is the product a substance, a formulated chemical product, a material, or an article? Is it a homogenous or heterogenous material? What is the product.
questions.helper: For a complicated product with many components, it may be valuable to complete PrISM for each component as opposed to only for the whole product.

questions.name: service_provided
questions.text: What is the service provided by the product?

questions.name: other_products
questions.text: What other products are used to provide this service?

questions.name: sustainability_attrs
questions.text: What sustainability attributes are you prioritizing to include in the design?
questions.helper: Consider the product overall and at each life cycle stage. We'll guide you through some examples first and then allow you to set your priorities

questions.name: feedstock_goals
questions.text: What is the preferred feedstock goal or goals? Please select all that apply.

questions.name: question_2
questions.text: What is the meaning of life?
